software.description:
Atlas Construction Toolkit Using Sparse Representation

Please refer to below papers for details:

"Infant Brain Atlases from Neonates to 1- and 2-year-olds", PLoS ONE, 6(4): e18746, Apr. 2011. [Feng Shi, Pew-Thian Yap, Guorong Wu, Hongjun Jia, John H. Gilmore, WeiliLin, Dinggang Shen]

"Neonatal Atlas Construction Using Sparse Representation”, Human Brain Mapping 35(9):4663–4677, 2014. [Feng Shi, Li Wang, Guorong Wu, Gang Li, John H. Gilmore, Weili Lin, Dinggang Shen]
software.maintainer: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
